mapper.select: select partnerOrgName,eventNumAll, CONCAT('[',GROUP_CONCAT(concat('{"name":"',name,'",','"num":"',eventNum,'"}') order by id asc) ,']') as orgJson from ( select id,name, d.partnerOrgName,if(eventNum is null,0,eventNum) as eventNum,d.eventNumAll from ( select * from( select id,name from app_industry where parentId = #{industryId} ) as a join (select partnerOrgName,eventNumAll from app_chart_project_org_partner where industryType = #{industryType} and timeType = #{timeType} and orgCode= #{orgCode} GROUP BY partnerOrgName,eventNumAll ) as b) as d LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from app_chart_project_org_partner where industryType = #{industryType} and timeType = #{timeType} and orgCode= #{orgCode}) AS c on d.id = c.industryId and d.partnerOrgName=c.partnerOrgName ORDER BY id ) as ff GROUP BY partnerOrgName,eventNumAll ORDER BY eventNumAll desc limit 10

select partnerOrgName,eventNumAll, CONCAT('[',GROUP_CONCAT(concat('{"name":"',name,'",','"num":"',eventNum,'"}') order by id asc) ,']') as orgJson from ( select id,name, d.partnerOrgName,if(eventNum is null,0,eventNum) as eventNum,d.eventNumAll from ( select * from( select id,name from app_industry where parentId = #{industryId} ) as a join (select partnerOrgName,eventNumAll from app_chart_project_org_partner where industryType = #{industryType} and timeType = #{timeType} and industryId=#{industryId} and orgCode= #{orgCode} GROUP BY partnerOrgName,eventNumAll ) as b) as d LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from app_chart_project_org_partner where industryType = #{industryType} and timeType = #{timeType} and orgCode= #{orgCode} and industryId=#{industryId}) AS c on d.id = c.industrySubId and d.partnerOrgName=c.partnerOrgName ORDER BY id ) as ff GROUP BY partnerOrgName,eventNumAll ORDER BY eventNumAll desc limit 10
